attribute.name: TotalDP
attribute.rule: substring(10 + u:attribute('CoDP') + u:attribute('AgDP') + u:attribute('SDDP') + u:attribute('MeDP') + u:attribute('ReDP'), 0, 5)

attribute.name: TotalHits
attribute.rule: floor(u:min(floor((.//skill[@name='Body Development']/@ranks * u:rules(concat('//race[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Race']/@value, '|]/attribute[@name=|HitsRank|]/@value'))) + .//attribute[@name='CoTp']/@value div 10) * (1 + u:parse(u:attribute('CoTo')) div 100), u:rules(concat('//race[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Race']/@value, '|]/attribute[@name=|MaxHits|]/@value'))))

attribute.name: PP
attribute.rule: u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Realms') = '', 0, (u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Mentalism'), u:attribute('PrPP'), 0) + u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Essence'), u:attribute('PrEm'), 0) + u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Channeling'), u:attribute('PrIn'), 0)) div (u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Mentalism'), 1, 0) + u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Essence'), 1, 0) + u:ifthenelse(contains(u:attribute('Realms'), 'Channeling'), 1, 0))) * u:attribute('Level')

attribute.name: DefBonus
attribute.rule: u:sign(u:ifthenelse(.//attribute[@name='AT']/@value = 1, u:parse(.//skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks) * 5 - u:max(u:parse(.//skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks) * 3 - 30, 0) - u:max(u:parse(.//skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks) - 20, 0), u:max(0, u:parse(u:attribute('QuTo')) + u:rules(concat('//armor/atype[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='AT']/@value, '|]/@quickness')))))

attribute.name: EffMove
attribute.rule: floor(u:attribute('BaseMove') * (350 + u:parse(u:skill('Run, Distance', 'total'))) * (150 + u:parse(u:skill('Run, Sprint', 'total'))) div 50 div (550 + u:parse(u:skill('Run, Distance', 'total'))) + 0.5)

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Academic')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Academic')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Academic')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Athletic')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Athletic')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Athletic')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Combat')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Combat')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Combat')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Concentration')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Concentration')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Concentration')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@General')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@General')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@General')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Linguistic')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Linguistic')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Linguistic')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Magical')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Magical')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Magical')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Medical')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Medical')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Medical')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Outdoor')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Outdoor')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Outdoor')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Perception')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Perception')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Perception')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Subterfuge')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Subterfuge')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Subterfuge')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:parse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Other'))), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Other')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Other')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

skill.name: Adrenal Defense
skill.total: u:sign(u:parse(u:skill('Adrenal Defense', 'level')) + u:parse(u:skill('Adrenal Defense', 'misc')) + u:parse(u:skill('Adrenal Defense', 'attr')) + u:parse(u:skill('Adrenal Defense', 'race')) + u:ifthenelse(./skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks <= 10, ./skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks * 5, u:ifthenelse(./skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks <= 20, 30 + ./skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks * 2, 50 + ./skill[@name='Adrenal Defense']/@ranks)))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Body')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Body')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Body')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))

modifier.name: level
modifier.value: floor(u:ifthenelse(u:attribute('Level') <= 20, u:attribute('Level') * u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Directed')), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Directed')) = 3, 40 + u:attribute('Level'), u:ifthenelse(u:rules(concat('//class[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Profession']/@value, '|]/@Directed')) = 2, 30 + floor(u:attribute('Level') div 2), 20))))
